description: Section 73 application seeking variation of conditions 2 (drawing numbers), 3 (playing of amplified music), 9 (use of grounds), 10 (restrictions around use of  London Room), 11 (use of grounds), 12 (restrictions on weddings and civil marriages) and 14 (use of grounds) of planning permission 17/14564/FUL.  Removal of conditions 13 (bookings unrelated to the approved use of the premises) and 15 (use of restaurant) of planning permission 17/14564/FUL.  Additional condition proposing controlled use of the Veitch Garden. (Revised submission)
